prompts: Create a powerful dinosaur-like Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains.
I want a Pokemon that has a spiky, armored body and can unleash dark energy.
Generate a massive creature with green scales and a fierce roar for battle.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a Tyrannosaurus with additional dragon-like features.
Imagine a towering beast with sharp spikes and a menacing presence in forests.
Design a Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings with a camouflaged design.
Give me a Pokemon that can easily intimidate opponents with its size and ferocity.
